amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide that the prohibition contained in the bill against funds being used to pay for abortions be applicable to Federal funds only.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to allow funds other than Federal funds to be expended for abortions.

action.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 180 - 243, 1 Present (Roll No. 408).
